page.title: 03CHURCHMEN OF WARGRAVE
page.content: Ordained priest 20 years ago and {Vicar of Wargrave}for the last 13 the Rev.John W.Ratings wears the familiar white collar and black cassock when he is working.He conducts marriages, baptisms,funerals and daily services in{St.Mary's}Church.He carries out many pastoral duties.Of the four governing bodies of the CofE schools in the parish,he is Chairman of two and a member of the others.He sits on several committees as an essential part of his job. The post of{Parish Clerk,}created 11 years ago, has been held since then by Granville Hawkes.He administers the Church office,keeps records & attends meetings.As an Elder and Lay Reader of the church he assists in decision making,helps the Vicar with services and with counselling people in need. He is the organist and choirmaster.
